channel.title: Humza Tareen — Engineering Blog
channel.description: Technical deep-dives on cloud architecture, AI/ML infrastructure, and production engineering. GCP, Kubernetes, Python, and distributed systems.

item.title: Building an AI Evaluation Platform on GCP: Architecture of a Multi-Cluster System
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A deep dive into the architecture behind a production-grade AI agent evaluation system on GCP with multiple Cloud Run services, several GKE clusters, and managed databases.

item.title: Event-Driven Architecture on GCP: Pub/Sub, Cloud Tasks, and Cloud Scheduler
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we orchestrated a 6-phase AI evaluation pipeline with dozens of Pub/Sub topics, dead-letter queues, and zero silent failures.

item.title: The Database Bug That Took Down Our AI Pipeline: Debugging AlloyDB SSL Drops
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we diagnosed and fixed random SSL connection failures in AlloyDB that were causing 5% of our evaluation tasks to fail.

item.title: How to Build Idempotent Cloud Tasks Handlers in Python
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A practical guide to building idempotent handlers for Google Cloud Tasks with FastAPI and PostgreSQL. The pattern that eliminated our duplicate record bugs.

item.title: Zero-Downtime Embedding Migration: Switching Models in a Production RAG System
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Step-by-step guide for migrating embedding models in production using pgvector, with zero downtime and zero data loss.

item.title: Rigour: An Open-Source AI Code Quality Tool
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How I built Rigour, an open-source quality gate for AI-generated code that supports 10+ languages and works with Cursor, Claude Code, Gemini, and more.

item.title: Building an RL Training Arena for AI Code Agents on GCP
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we built a reinforcement learning environment for training AI coding agents using GKE, Cloud Build sandboxing, Redis, and Firestore.

item.title: How I Audited Our AI Platform and Found Critical Security Gaps
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A systematic security audit of a production AI evaluation platform revealed SQL injection, hardcoded credentials, and a monolithic God Class. Here's the methodology and fixes.

item.title: Building the Core AI Evaluation Engine: AlloyDB Fixes, Autoscaling, and a Headless API
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Deep dive into the core evaluation engine covering AlloyDB SSL fixes, KEDA autoscaling, Firestore misrouting, continuous learning, and a headless API.

item.title: Building an Automated LLM Scoring Service: From Prototype to Production
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: From idempotent Cloud Tasks to LiteLLM proxy, Redis state management, and VPC networking battles. Shipping an automated LLM rating service.

item.title: Building an Auth Gateway with Admin Dashboard: JWT, OIDC, and Notifications Admin
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Auth gateway with Google OIDC, JWT, Kong integration, notifications admin dashboard, and critical security issues filed.

item.title: Building a Notification Service: Cloud Tasks Delivery, Circuit Breakers, and Webhook Dispatch
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Production notification service with Cloud Tasks delivery, circuit breakers, dead-letter queues, and Alembic migrations from scratch.

item.title: Building a RAG Retrieval Service: pgvector, Embedding Migrations, and Provenance Tracking
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: RAG retrieval service with pgvector. Emergency embedding migration in 48 hours with zero downtime, plus provenance tracking.

item.title: Building an RL Training Arena: Gym-Style API and Cloud Build Sandboxing
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: RL training arena for AI coding agents. Gym-style API, Cloud Build sandboxing, 15-step preprocessor. Built from scratch.

item.title: Four More Services: Workflow Orchestration, Taxonomy Engine, Platform Core, and Memory Evals
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Four additional services: HITL workflow orchestrator, taxonomy workflow engine, core platform service, and memory evaluation suite.
